App Description for Kika Emoji Keyboard Pro + Gifs

Brief: Kika Emoji Keyboard Pro + Gifs is the ultimate keyboard customization app enhancing users' typing experience with a plethora of emojis, emoticons, GIFs, stickers, and artistic keyboard layouts. It simplifies communicating across various social platforms including Kik, Messenger, WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook, while also offering the first keyboard layout for the Bashkir language.

Whether you love emojis, enjoy personal customization, or need language versatility, this keyboard could be a delightful addition to your app arsenal.
